subject: Re: [junit] Logs
msgSnippet: ... Why do you expect a log file to be created? What code did you add to JUnit to make it create a log file in this directory? Can you post the code? Regards,
messageBody:
--- Sumeet.Sharma@... wrote:
> I'm using junit3.6 framework .As i run a testcase , I expect a report
> ( log file) to be created in the c:\junitLogs directory (I've created

> one in c: )

Why do you expect a log file to be created? What code did you add to
JUnit to make it create a log file in this directory? Can you post the
code?

Regards,

Rob
